text:
Hello, colleagues,
I tried optional task StarTeam checkout (STCheckout, previos starteam task). 
None from build file below target "checkout1" or target "checkout1" works. Do 
you have separate *.jar file for optional tasks for ANT vertion 1.6.1? If not, 
I can see "ant-starteam.jar" in lib of ant 1.6.1. Which StarTeam task it 
includes: "starteam", "STCheckout", "StarTeamCheckOut"...? Can somerbody 
correct sample below to show syntax, how to use checkout StarTeam task of ANT 
1.6.1?
<?xml version="1.0"?>

<!-- build.xml - a test StarTeam checkout buildfile -->
<project name="CheckOut From StarTeam" default="checkout1" basedir=".">
  <!-- Target to checkout sourse from StarTeam version 1-->
  <!-- CheckOut StarTeam target. -->
  <target name="checkout1">
     <STCheckout servername="STARTEAMBKUP" 
        serverport="1024"
        projectname="ANT_TEST" 
        viewname="ANT_TEST"
        username="ant"
        password="test"
        rootlocalfolder="C:\ANT_TEST"
        force="true"
     />
  </target>
  <target name="checkout2">
     <starteam servername="STARTEAMBKUP" 
        serverport="1024"
        projectname="ANT_TEST" 
        viewname="ANT_TEST"
        username="ant"
        password="test"
        rootlocalfolder="C:\ANT_TEST"
        force="true"
     />
  </target>
</project>
creator: alexzmachinski@hotmail.com

text:
Please, close this bug... This is lack of documentation. 
In documentation samples task is "STCheckout" instead of "stcheckout", 
parameter "force" instead of "forced"... I think all other StarTeam tasks has 
same problem in documentation. Need to be updated. Best regards, Alex.
Working sample:
<!-- build.xml - a test StarTeam checkout buildfile -->
<project name="CheckOut From StarTeam" default="checkout1" basedir=".">
  <!-- Target to checkout sourse from StarTeam version 1-->
  <!-- CheckOut StarTeam target. -->
  <target name="checkout1">
     <stcheckout servername="STARTEAMBKUP" 
        serverport="1024"
        projectname="ANT_TEST" 
        viewname="ANT_TEST"
        username="ant"
        password="test"
        rootlocalfolder="C:\ANT_TEST"
        forced="true"
     />
  </target>
</project>
creator: alexzmachinski@hotmail.com
peter.reilly@corvil.com
text:
Updated the manual page.
Thanks for the report
